department.dept_long_name: Department of Visual and Environmental Studies

course.title: Volume: Sculpture Course
course.description: A course in which we will investigate the 3-dimensionality of sculpture, asking questions about the space it consumes. We will look at the environment around us and talk about the ways in which the work we make impacts our surroundings. We will think about hills, valleys, caves, stalactites, stalagmites, highrelief, bas-relief and protrusions. We will think about mass that is kinetic, static, hanging, sitting, balanced and imbalanced.
